resources.string: LIST YOUR ITEM AND SWAP YOUR ITEM EASILY
CHAT WITH OTHER USERS AND TRADERS
Do you want your unwanted old stuff to exchange for something you can use now? \nThen SwappIT is the best app for you!
SwappIT makes it easier for you to look for nice items you liked to swap using only your mobile phone in your home or anywhere.
Chat with traders about the item you are interested by commenting on their post
Search and find your item easily using the search feature of the app. \n You can also choose to view only the items of the traders you are following
SwappIT has a notification bell feature to help the \nusers to be notified and updated easily! \nWhat are you waiting for SwappIT now!
